branchCategory.name: C(D)QP2B, Compact Cylinder, Single Acting, Single Rod, Axial Piping
branchCategory.description: Axial piping version of the standard single acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder include ports on the end of the actuator. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.
